doctor.name: Dr. Ashim Kumar Ghosh
doctor.info: Dr. Ashim Kumar Ghosh is a Cancer Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, MPhil (Radiotherapy). He is a Assistant Professor, Oncology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medipath Diagnostic Complex, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Ashim Kumar Ghosh at Medipath Diagnostic Complex, Rajshahi is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.info: Dr. A.K.M Nurul Amin is a Cancer Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, M.Phil (Oncology), FCGP, FIGP, PhD, MWMA, PGCC. He is a Former Senior House Physician, Oncology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Rajshahi Metropolitan Hospital. Practicing hour of Dr. A.K.M Nurul Amin at Rajshahi Metropolitan Hospital is 9am to 1pm & 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).
